metadata.title: CVE-2020-25672 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory leak vulnerability was found in Linux kernel in llcp_sock_connect

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-222-generic - 4.4.0-222.255
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-222-generic - 4.4.0-222.255
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-222-lowlatency - 4.4.0-222.255
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-144-generic - 4.15.0-144.148~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-144-generic - 4.15.0-144.148~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-144-lowlatency - 4.15.0-144.148~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1103-kvm - 4.4.0-1103.112
